dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: The Literature Club girls conclude their song with laughter and cheer. The music room is alight with excitement and joy.

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I can’t believe we waited this long to all sing together! I wanna do this so much more often!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "There’s always plenty of extra time during club meetings to keep singing, and I’m more than excited to sing some more with everyone. We sound amazing together!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Maybe next time we can get the other three to join us too."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I haven’t seen any of them around. Do you think they’ll show up for the club meeting today?"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Actually, I just remembered-! Sayori, didn’t you have exciting news you wanted to share with us?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Oh oh! I do! Thank you for reminding me!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "You guys aren’t gonna believe this, but you know how my friend keeps refusing to sing with us?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I saw him in the clubroom with Boyfriend and Girlfriend, and I could have sworn I heard him singing!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Heh heh, about time he gave in. I was gonna keep bullying that dope until he did."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I’m surprised he stuck out not singing for so long. You think we’ll catch him mid-song if we all sneak in right now?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Let’s go and see! To the club!"
